question: Which Union Ministry monitors infrastructure projects worth Rs 150 crore and above?
option3: Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation
option4: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
answer: Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation
explanation:
As per the latest report released by the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MoSPI), about 403 infrastructure projects are hit by cost overruns of Rs 4.05 lakh crore.
Due to delays and other reasons, the projects each worth Rs 150 crore or more have been affected by overruns. MoSPI monitors infrastructure projects worth Rs 150 crore and above. Out of the 1686 projects, while 403 ones reported cost overruns and 530 projects reported time escalation.
